text:
Geli (http://www.geli.net) | San Francisco | Fulltime

We're working towards building the future of energy distribution through clever use of batteries and solar.

We're series A backed by some of the most respected names in the Energy industry.

There's multiple openings for Full-stack engineers, A frontend lead, and a QA engineer. A super-fun opportunity to work on a hardware-software solution that the world legitimately needs.

http://geli.net/about-geli/careers/

Tech: Java, MQTT, Cassandra, React, CANbus, Modbus, embedded linux
